message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we settle at $128? That's a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. How about we meet in the middle again? I'm willing to pay $126 for the product.
